rationale: The segment does not contain an intensifier or comparative adjective directly modifying a risk-adjective.
The segment provides a factual report without high-potency verbs or metaphors.
This is a neutral statement about expected results.
The segment does not contain a loaded rhetorical question.
The segment reports status (awaiting results) but contains no explicit calming language.
The segment does not contain a minimiser word combined with a scale contrast.
The segment does not contain a bare negation.
